title: Cubs Pitcher Thinks On The Fly To Get The Out At First
teaser: Pitcher Jon Lester caught a ground ball but it got stuck in the webbing of his glove â€” he couldn't throw the ball. Finally, he threw the entire glove to the first baseman, who caught it for the out.
